WorldRemit (https://www.worldremit.com/)| London, UK | Onsite | Full Time | Weâ€™re looking for: - iOS Engineer (Swift) - Android Engineer (Kotlin) - Software Engineer (.Net) - QA Engineer

WorldRemit is a FinTech scale up specialising in money transfers around the world, specifically to the developing world and the 2 billion unbanked, using mobile money. We are one of the fastest growing FinTech scale ups in Europe, growing at 50% YoY.

To apply email sovenden@worldremit.com or apply through our website https://www.worldremit.com/en/careers
